title: Start
body:
You weigh anchor by a verdant island paradise, rich in fruit.
However, as you prepare to harvest its bounty...
...a fearsome lizard emerges from the trees!
[[Run away screaming.|runaway]]
[[Don't move. It can't see you if you don't move.|staystill]]
[[Do a Mexican wave!|mexicanwave]]

title: runaway
body:
<<set $food to $food + 50>>
You run away screaming.
The lizard stomps after you!
You wait on your ship until it wanders off...
...then return to pick up the fruit shaken from the trees!
<<navigation>>

title: staystill
body:
<<set $crew to $crew - 1>>
You don't move. It can't see you if yot don't move.
Except apparently it can.
You run away screaming after all, minus Pegleg Pete.
<<navigation>>
